data.chText: 编辑，编纂，校订（文章、书籍等）
data.enText: to prepare a piece of writing, a book, etc. to be published by correcting the mistakes, making improvements to it, etc.

data.chText: 我知道这篇草稿需要校订。
data.enText: I know that this draft text will need to be edited.

data.chText: 这是我的演讲稿选编本。
data.enText: This is the edited version of my speech (= some parts have been taken out) .
to prepare a book to be published by collecting together and arranging pieces of writing by one or more authors

data.chText: 他正在编辑一本艾赛亚∙伯林的散文集。
data.enText: He's editing a book of essays by Isaiah Berlin.
to make changes to text or data on screen

data.chText: 你可以把文件下载，用文字处理系统做编辑。
data.enText: You can download the file and edit it on your word processor.

data.chText: 剪辑，剪接（影片、电视节目等）
data.enText: when sb edits a film/movie, television programme, etc. they take what has been filmed or recorded and decide which parts to include and in which order

data.chText: 他们正在放映上月比赛的精彩片段剪辑。
data.enText: They're showing the edited highlights of last month's game.
to be responsible for planning and publishing a newspaper, magazine, etc. (= to be the editor )
She used to edit a women's magazine.

data.chText: 我呈交论文之前有点时间，很快地校订了一遍。
data.enText: I had time to do a quick edit of my essay before handing it in.
to remove words, phrases or scenes from a book, programme, etc. before it is published or shown

data.chText: 他们删掉了采访中提到她父亲的部分。
data.enText: They edited out references to her father in the interview.

simple_means.memory_skill: e 出 + dit 给予 → 给出〔好文章〕→ 编辑

data.enText: to remove words, phrases or scenes from a book, programme, etc. before it is published or shown

data.chText: 他们删掉了采访中提到她父亲的部分。
data.enText: They edited out references to her father in the interview.

trans: （常因可能具有冒犯性而）删除，删节

tr: prepare for publication or presentation by correcting, revising, or adapting
example: Edit a book on lexical semantics
she edited the letters of the politician so as to omit the most personal passages

tr: cut and assemble the components of

example: The same family has been editing the influential newspaper for almost 100 years

value.def: If you edit a text such as an article or a book, you correct and adapt it so that it is suitable for publishing.

example.ex: The majority of contracts give the publisher the right to edit a book after it's done.
example.tran: 大多数合同都赋予出版商在书稿完成后进行校订的权利。

example.ex: Throughout the editing of this book, we have had much support and encouragement.
example.tran: 在本书的编辑过程中，我们得到了很多支持和鼓励。

value.def: If you edit a book or a series of books, you collect several pieces of writing by different authors and prepare them for publishing.

example.ex: This collection of essays is edited by Ellen Knight...
example.tran: 这本文集是由埃伦·奈特编选的。

example.ex: She has edited the media studies quarterly, Screen.
example.tran: 她编选了这本媒体研究季刊——《银幕》。

example.ex: ...the Real Sandwich Book, edited by Miriam Polunin.
example.tran: 米里亚姆·波留宁选辑而成的《美味三明治制作大全》

example.ex: He was certainly not cut out to combine the jobs of editing and writing as a journalist.
example.tran: 他显然做不来记者这种既要编选材料又要动笔写稿的工作。

value.def: If you edit a film or a television or radio programme, you choose some of what has been filmed or recorded and arrange it in a particular order.

example.ex: He taught me to edit and splice film...
He is editing together excerpts of some of his films.
example.tran: 他正在将自己制作的一些电影的片断进行剪辑合成。

value.tran: 剪辑（电影、电视或广播节目）

example.ex: He sat in on much of the filming and early editing.
example.tran: 他在旁参与了大量拍摄和初期剪辑工作。

value.def: Someone who edits a newspaper, magazine, or journal is in charge of it.

example.ex: I used to edit the college paper in the old days.
example.tran: 以前我曾经做过大学校报的主编。

value.def: An edit is the process of examining and correcting a text so that it is suitable for publishing.

example.ex: The purpose of the edit is fairly simple—to chop out the boring bits from the original.
example.tran: 编辑的目的非常简单——删掉原稿中那些无用的部分。

trans: （常因可能具有冒犯性而）删除，删节

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 共同 + dit 给予 + ion 表名词 → 共同给出〔前提〕→ 条件
con 加强 + don 给予 + e → 给予〔大度〕→ 原谅
don 给予 + ate 做，造成，使… → 给出去 → 捐赠
don 给予 + or 表人 → 给予的人 → 捐献者
e 出 + dit 给予 → 给出〔好文章〕→ 编辑
en 使… + dow 给予 → 资助；捐赠
extra 向外 + dit 给予 + e → 向外交出〔逃犯〕→ 引渡
par 平等 + don 给予 → 原谅，宽恕
tra〔= trans 转移〕+ dit 给予 + ion 表名词 → 代代相传 → 传统
